about_the_game:
Expand your party with more non-human members with the RPG Character Pack 12! Gee-kun-soft’s latest pack offers up 16 new characters who all have standout features that include fur, feathers, and scales! Each character comes with a MZ style sprite, downed poses, faceset, frontview enemy image with color variations, image busts, and SV battlers, meaning you can turn enemies into friends after a dramatic battle or finding out that your bff (best friend fur-ever) was secretly the villain all along!

This pack also includes a full-size image for each character so you can adjust the size to perfectly fit your game’s screen size. If you’ve been needing to add some fluffy fox and cat girls to your party or really want to have some lizardmen as romanceable teammates, pick up the RPG Character Pack 12!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
